name: io.github.lio1204/what2watch-mcp
description: AI-powered entertainment discovery. Real-time TV schedules for 1000+ channels, streaming availability across Netflix/Disney+/HBO Max and more, free FAST channels, and personalized recommendations. Works with Claude & ChatGPT.

tools.name: get_recommendation
tools.description: Get personalized movie and TV recommendations based on mood, taste, platforms, and viewing history

tools.name: search_content
tools.description: Search for movies and shows by title, actor, director, genre, or keywords

tools.name: get_content_details
tools.description: Get full details about a specific movie or TV show including cast, plot, ratings, and streaming availability

tools.name: get_schedule
tools.description: Get real-time TV broadcast schedules - what's on live TV now or later

tools.name: get_trending
tools.description: See what's popular and trending right now across streaming platforms

tools.name: get_available_sources
tools.description: List all supported streaming platforms and TV channels

prompts.name: what_to_watch
prompts.description: Get personalized recommendations for 'I don't know what to watch'

prompts.name: surprise_me
prompts.description: Discover hidden gems and underrated content

prompts.name: whats_on_tv
prompts.description: Check what's on live TV tonight or now
